thread.title: First song from Vipin Atley's movie, 'Ben', released
thread.title_full: First song from Vipin Atley's movie, 'Ben', released - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: First song from Vipin Atley's movie, 'Ben', released
text:
'Oh ente jeevitham...'from Vipin Atley's debut movie, 'Ben', is sung by Gaurav Menon, Adhish, Leah Anne Philip, Joel from Ben.
The film revolves around 10-year-old Ben and holds a mirror to society. The song has beautiful visuals that would appeal both young and adult and is written and composed by the director of the film, Vipin Atley.
